column3: now living in [[New Zealand]]. He worked with [[Peter Jackson]] in an uncredited role in ''[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116365/ The Frighteners]''
column4: and work with him again in Jackson's grand opus. He is credited as "[[Gondor|Gondorian]] archivist" in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
